welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rochester, a charming city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Lipuma's Coney Island

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a cafe, gift shop, and rental car services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal and is free for all passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport offers exclusive services for private jet travelers.
